original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v, badges as b WHERE p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Id = pl.RelatedPostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND b.UserId = c.UserId AND c.Score=0 AND p.Score<=67 AND ph.PostHistoryTypeId=34 AND b.Date<=CAST('2014-08-20 12:16:56' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E5 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E1.PostId=E5.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.Score <= 67
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E5E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E5.PostId=E2.Id)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.PostHistoryTypeId = 34
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E5E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1E5E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E5E2.PostId=E4.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE badges.Date <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-20 12:16:56'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E5E2E4E6 AS SELECT * FROM E1E5E2E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E1E5E2E4.UserId=E6.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E5E2E4E6E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E5E2E4E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E5E2E4E6.PostId=E3.RelatedPostId)
